job_details.job description: IT Helpdesk Trainee (Internal). 12-month role supporting internal employees. Learn to troubleshoot hardware/software issues,  set up new user accounts,  and manage IT assets.
job_details.required qualification: Diploma in Computer Science/IT or B.Sc (IT). Must meet PMIS age (21-24) and income (<8L) criteria.

job_details.job description: IT Recruitment Support Trainee. Provide administrative support to the talent acquisition team. Learn to source candidates,  schedule interviews,  and manage applicant data.
job_details.required qualification: BBA (HR) or B.A. (Psychology/English) graduate (non-premier). Must meet PMIS age (21-24) and income (<8L) criteria.

job_details.job description: Agri-Business Trainee (E-Choupal). 12-month field role. Interact with farmers,  learn commodity procurement processes,  and support warehouse operations.
job_details.required qualification: B.Sc (Agriculture) (non-premier institute). Must meet PMIS age (21-24) and income (<8L) criteria.

job_details.job description: IT Helpdesk Trainee. 12-month role at a field office. Provide basic IT support (hardware,  software,  network) to employees. Log and resolve tickets.
job_details.required qualification: Diploma in Computer Science/IT. Must meet PMIS age (21-24) and income (<8L) criteria.

job_details.job description: HR Trainee (Admin). 12-month office role at a factory. Support HR functions like time-keeping,  employee records,  and training coordination.
job_details.required qualification: BBA (HR) graduate (non-premier institute). Must meet PMIS age (21-24) and income (<8L) criteria.

job_details.job description: IT Helpdesk Trainee (Internal). 12-month role providing basic IT support to HCL employees. Handle password resets,  software installation.
job_details.required qualification: B.Sc (IT) or BCA (non-premier institute). Must meet PMIS age (21-24) and income (<8L) criteria.

job_details.job description: IT Helpdesk Trainee (Voice). 12-month role providing technical support to customers via phone. Troubleshoot hardware/software issues.
job_details.required qualification: B.Sc (IT) or BCA (non-premier institute). Good communication skills. Must meet PMIS eligibility.

job_details.job description: IT Helpdesk Trainee (Internal). 12-month role providing basic IT support to HCL employees. Handle password resets,  software installation.
job_details.required qualification: B.Sc (IT) or BCA (non-premier institute). Must meet PMIS age (21-24) and income (<8L) criteria.

job_details.company: Oil and Natural Gas Corporation Limited
job_details.job description: Administrative Support Trainee. 12-month office role supporting a regional office. Assist in file management,  data entry,  and procurement documentation.
job_details.required qualification: B.A. or B.Com graduate (non-premier institute). Basic computer skills required. Must meet PMIS age and income criteria.

job_details.job description: Network Trainee (Internal IT). 12-month role supporting the internal IT team. Assist with LAN/WAN troubleshooting,  managing network assets,  and cabling.
job_details.required qualification: Diploma in Computer Science/IT. Must meet PMIS age (21-24) and income (<8L) criteria.
